summary: MODDERS RESOURCE (!) - Ring mesh+textures - provisional .esp to test ingame - free to use
descriptionHtml:
This is a MODDERS RESOURCE, free to use for anyone in their own projects.

I created a .esp mod file as well so you can test it ingame, just unpack the archive to ...Skyrim|data. Ghosu Ring craftable at forge (jewelery). YES, even as a normal player you could use the ring as well.

1x .esp (mod plugin)
2x .nif (weighted character + world model)
3x .dds (diffuse, normal, specular)

[youtube]qFwxRbCzNKw[/youtube]


THIS IS NOT AMONG MY MAJOR PROJECTS, I DON'T ENHANCE THIS "MOD" - IT'S JUST A MODDERS RESOURCE!

greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
